description: A sweet and juicy fruit that comes in red, green, and yellow colors. Apples are a great source of vitamins!
A long, curved fruit with a yellow peel and a creamy white inscide. Bananas are a good source of potassium!
A round citrus fruit with a bright orange peel and juicy, tangy segments inscide. Oranges are a good source of vitamin C!
A round object you can throw, bounce, or kick. Balls come in many sizes and colors and are fun to play with!
A furry pet with soft fur, whiskers, and a tail. Cats love to purr, play, and take naps in sunny spots!
A loyal and playful pet with fur, a wet nose, and a wagging tail. Dogs love to go for walks, play fetch, and cuddle with their humans!
A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves. Trees provcide shade, clean air, and homes for many animals!
The colorful part of a plant that comes in many shapes, sizes, and smells. Flowers attract bees and butterflies that help them reproduce!
A building where people live. Houses come in all shapes and sizes and provcide shelter, warmth, and a place to call home!
A vehicle with wheels that is used for transportation. Cars come in many colors and styles and can take you on adventures!
The giant star at the center of our solar system. The sun provcides light and warmth to Earth, allowing plants to grow and life to thrive!
Earth's natural satellite that orbits around our planet. The moon reflects sunlight, giving us light at night and causing tcides in the ocean!
A warm-blooded animal with feathers, wings, and a beak. Birds can fly and come in many different colors and sizes!
A cold-blooded animal that lives in water and has fins for swimming. Fish come in all shapes and sizes and play an important role in the ocean ecosystem!
